metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data of Uranium deposits in South China (Since 200 Ma)
metadata.titleCn: 华南铀矿床地球化学数据（200 Ma以来）
metadata.description:
This data set comes from four published academic papers.
Paper 1: La – ICP – MS was used to analyze the REE composition of uranium mineral particles in different metallogenic ages of Xianshi uranium deposit in South China. Based on the data obtained, it can be seen that the REE distribution characteristics of the three groups of uranium minerals are similar. However, the contents of rare earth elements in uranium minerals in different metallogenic stages are obviously different, even several orders of magnitude, such as La, EU, Dy, Yb and Lu. It is worth noting that most of the REE patterns of these uranium minerals show slight positive EU anomalies. The REE patterns of Xianshi uranium minerals are different from those of the surrounding rocks of the Zhudong granite, diabase in Xianshi uranium deposit and pitchblende related to granite type uranium deposits, and are also different from those of other types of uranium deposits. Combined with the author's previous research results, we propose that the uranium mineral in Xianshi uranium deposit may not be the uranium oxide (e.g., UO2 or u3o7) generally considered by predecessors. Therefore, the REE characteristics of Xianshi uranium mineral further support that it may be a new uranium mineral, vorlanite.
Thesis 2: by optimizing the Sims U-Pb dating process of young uranium minerals and improving the high common Pb data processing method, this paper further expands the application scope of SIMS U-Pb dating of uranium minerals; The Sims U-Pb age of uranium mineral in menggongjie granite type uranium deposit in northern Guangxi is 1.9 by using Sims U-Pb dating technique combined with traditional U-Th-Pb chemical age method ±  The U-Th-Pb chemical age of uranium mineral is 2.3 ±  The mineralization events of the deposit are almost simultaneous with the emplacement process of volcanic rocks (2.1 – 1.2 MA) in the Quaternary extensional setting of South China; It is the youngest uranium mineralization event in South China.
Paper 3: This paper systematically reviews and analyzes the development process of uranium mineralization dating methods, and reviews five main methods of uranium mineral dating: (1) u-th-totalpb chemical age of uranium minerals（ 2) Model age of uranium minerals（ 3) Traditional isochron age of uranium minerals（ 4) The age of associated minerals of uranium minerals（ 5) U-Pb age of uranium minerals in situ micro area; The existing problems and corresponding schemes in the study of uranium mineralization dating are discussed in depth, which is expected to promote the development of metallogenic geochronology of uranium deposits in the future.
Paper 4: the age of two groups of NWW trending basic dikes and one group of nee trending basic dikes obtained by amphibole ar AR method in Xiazhuang is 200-180 ma. The age of these basic dikes is consistent with the zircon U-Pb age of Xiazhuang basic dikes within the error range, which further confirms the existence of Early Jurassic basic magmatism in Xiazhuang area, northern Guangdong Province. Although the age of uranium mineralization has not been reported yet, the existence of these early basic dikes is of great geological significance to the understanding of uranium mineralization and regional tectonic evolution. It indicates that South China is in extensional tectonic geological setting at the moment, indicating that lithospheric extension in South China may have started at least 200-190 Ma after Indosinian collision orogeny.
Note 1: GPS coordinates of menggongjie uranium deposit: n26 ° 11′ ，E110 ° 30′。
Note 2: GPS coordinates of Xiazhuang uranium mine: n24 ° 33′，E114 ° 14′。
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集来源于来源于四篇已发表的学术论文。
论文1：该论文利用LA–ICP–MS分析华南仙石铀矿床中不同成矿时代铀矿物颗粒的稀土元素组分。基于获得的数据可以看出，三组铀矿物的稀土元素呈现出类似的分布特征。但不同成矿阶段铀矿物中稀土元素的含量明显不同，甚至相差几个数量级，如La,  Eu, Dy, Yb 和Lu等元素。值得注意的是，这些铀矿物REEs配分模式大多显示出轻微的Eu正异常，仙石铀矿物REEs配分模式与笋洞花岗岩围岩、仙石铀矿区辉绿岩以及花岗岩型铀矿相关的沥青铀矿稀土配分模式均不同，且也不同与其他类型铀矿床中铀矿物的REEs配分模式。结合作者已有的研究成果，我们提出仙石铀矿床中的铀矿物可能不是前人通常认为的铀氧化物(e.g., UO2 or U3O7)。因此，仙石铀矿物的REEs特征，更进一步支持其可能为一种新的铀矿物高铀酸钙(Vorlanite)。
论文2：该论文通过对年轻铀矿物SIMS U-Pb定年过程的优化和高普通Pb数据处理方式的改进，进一步拓展了SIMS铀矿物的U-Pb定年适用范围；运用二次离子探针(SIMS)铀矿物U-Pb定年技术，结合传统铀矿物U-Th-Pb化学年龄法，获得桂北孟公界花岗岩型铀矿中铀矿物SIMS U-Pb年龄为1.9 ± 0.7 Ma，与铀矿物U-Th-Pb化学年龄2.3 ± 0.1 Ma在误差范围内一致，且矿床的矿化作用事件与华南第四纪伸展背景下火山岩(2.1–1.2 Ma)的侵位作用过程近同时；是目前识别出的华南最为年轻的铀矿化事件。
论文3：本论文针对铀矿化定年方法的发展历程进行了系统梳理和分析，评述了铀矿物定年的五种主要方法：(1) 铀矿物U-Th-totalPb化学年龄；(2) 铀矿物模式年龄；(3) 铀矿物传统等时线年龄；(4) 铀矿物矿伴生矿物年龄；(5) 原位微区铀矿物U-Pb年龄；深入探讨了铀矿化作用定年研究中存在的问题和对应方案，期望促进未来铀矿床成矿年代学的发展。
论文4：该论文利用角闪石Ar-Ar法新获得的下庄两组NWW向基性岩脉和一组NEE向基性岩脉的年龄为200~180 Ma，这些基性岩脉的年龄与下庄基性岩脉锆石U-Pb年龄在误差范围内总体一致，进一步确认粤北下庄地区存在早侏罗世的基性岩浆活动。尽管与其对应期次的铀矿化年龄迄今还未见报道，但这些早期基性岩脉的存在对铀成矿作用的认识及区域地质构造演化具有极其重要的地质意义。表明华南地区此刻处在伸展构造地质背景，标志着印支期碰撞造山作用发生后华南地区岩石圈伸展作用可能至少在200~190 Ma已经开始。
注1：孟公界铀矿GPS坐标：N26°11′ ，E110°30′。
注2：下庄铀矿GPS坐标：N24°33′，E114°14′。
metadata.instructions:
File naming: the data set is stored in Microsoft Word and excel document formats
The file name is:
1 - Table 1 LA-ICP-MS REE compositions of uranium minerals from Xianshi uranium deposit in North Guangdong, South China
2-Table 1. Oxide concentrations (wt.%) of uraninite from the MGJ deposit
2-Table 2. SIMS U-Pb data for uraninite from the MGJ uranium deposit corrected using LAMNH standard with Poisson% errors
2-Table 3. Isotopic compositions of LAMNH standard measured by TIMS (Evins et al., 2001)
3-table 1 EPMA results of pitchblende in menggongjie granite type uranium deposit, Northern Guangxi (according to Luo et al., 2017)
3-table 2 Sims U-Pb isotope and standard sample lamnh test results of pitchblende from menggongjie granite type uranium deposit in northern Guangxi (according to Luo et al., 2017)
3-table 3 U-Pb isotopic test results of pitchblende in zanziping uranium deposit, Northern Guangxi (according to Xu Weichang et al., 1988)
3-table 4 U-Pb isotopic test results of pitchblende in shasanjiang uranium deposit, Northern Guangxi (according to Shi Shaohua et al., 2010)
3-table 5 U-Pb isotopic data of uranium ore of No. 661 deposit in Ganhang volcanic rock uranium ore belt (according to Tian Jianji et al., 2010)
3-table 6 U-Pb isotopic ages of zircon, uraninite and pyrite from U-bearing Jasper veins in sunshine uranium deposit, USA (according to Zartman and Smith, 2009)
3-table 7 SM Nd isotopic analysis of calcite in 6722 granite type uranium deposit, southern Jiangxi Province (according to Chen Heng et al., 2012)
4 - Table 1 main basic dikes and related uranium deposits and mineralization points in Xiazhuang uranium mining area (according to Zhang Zhanshi, 2011; Feng Zhijun et al., 2016; (this article)
4-table 2 dating data of 40Ar39Ar stage temperature rise of five amphiboles in Xiazhuang area, northern Guangdong Province
Data reading mode: the data set is opened by Microsoft Word and Excel software
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：该数据集以Microsoft Word和Excel文档格式存储
文件名称为：
1-表1 华南粤北地区仙石铀矿床中铀矿物 LA-ICP-MS稀土元素组分
2-Table 1. Oxide concentrations (wt.%) of uraninite from the MGJ deposit
2-Table 2. SIMS U-Pb data for uraninite from the MGJ uranium deposit corrected using LAMNH standard with Poisson% errors
2-Table 3. Isotopic compositions of LAMNH standard measured by TIMS (Evins et al., 2001)
3-表1 桂北孟公界花岗岩型铀矿床沥青铀矿电子探针测定结果（wt%）（据Luo et al., 2017）
3-表2 桂北孟公界花岗岩型铀矿床沥青铀矿SIMS U-Pb同位素及标样LAMNH测试结果（据Luo et al., 2017）
3-表3 桂北铲子坪铀矿床沥青铀矿U-Pb同位素测试结果（据徐伟昌等，1988）
3-表4 桂北沙子江铀矿床沥青铀矿U-Pb同位素测试结果（据石少华等，2010）
3-表5 赣杭火山岩铀矿带中661矿床铀矿石U-Pb同位素数据（据田建吉等，2010）
3-表6 美国Sunshine铀矿床中含铀碧玉脉中锆石、钛铀矿和黄铁矿U-Pb同位素年龄数据（据Zartman and Smith，2009）
3-表7 赣南6722花岗岩型铀矿床中方解石Sm-Nd同位素分析结果（据陈恒等，2012）
4-表1 下庄铀矿区主要基性岩脉及其相关的铀矿床和矿化点（据张展适，2011；冯志军等，2016；本文）
4-表2 粤北下庄地区基性岩脉中5个角闪石40Ar39Ar阶段升温测年数据
数据读取方式：该数据集以Microsoft Word和Excel软件打开

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of geochemical data collection techniques used for studying uranium deposits in South China since 200 Ma?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 自2亿年前以来，用于研究中国南方铀矿床的地球化学数据采集技术的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: LA–ICP–MS for analyzing rare earth element compositions, SIMS U-Pb dating methods
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: LA–ICP–MS 用于分析稀土元素组成，SIMS U-Pb 定年方法

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of employing LA–ICP–MS in analyzing rare earth element composition in uranium minerals?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在分析铀矿物中的稀土元素成分时，采用LA–ICP–MS的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: LA–ICP–MS is significant for analyzing rare earth element composition in uranium minerals as it allows for detailed examination of the elemental distribution and concentration within different mineralization stages. This method can reveal variations in rare earth elements such as La, Eu, Dy, Yb, and Lu, which may indicate different formation processes or conditions, supporting the identification of potential new uranium minerals like high-uranium calcium (Vorlanite) in the context of the Sian Stone uranium deposit.
Definition.AnswerCn: LA–ICP–MS在分析铀矿物中的稀土元素组成方面具有重要意义，因为它可以详细检查不同矿化阶段中元素的分布和浓度。这种方法可以揭示稀土元素如La、Eu、Dy、Yb和Lu的变化，这可能表明不同的形成过程或条件，从而支持在Sian Stone铀矿床的背景下识别潜在的新铀矿物，如高铀钙矿（Vorlanite）。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the methods of using LA–ICP–MS for analyzing rare earth elements in uranium minerals compare to SIMS U-Pb dating in terms of their application and effectiveness in studying uranium mineralization in South China?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用LA–ICP–MS分析铀矿物中的稀土元素的方法与SIMS U-Pb定年在研究中国南方铀矿化方面的应用和有效性有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The LA–ICP–MS method is used to analyze the rare earth element composition of uranium minerals, focusing on their distribution and concentration differences across mineralization stages. This method helps identify unique REEs patterns, suggesting potential new uranium minerals. In contrast, SIMS U-Pb dating is applied for determining the age of uranium minerals, with improvements in handling common Pb data and extending dating applicability. While LA–ICP–MS provides insights into the geochemical characteristics and mineral identity, SIMS U-Pb dating offers precise age determination, aiding in understanding the timing of mineralization events.
Comparison.AnswerCn: LA–ICP–MS 方法用于分析铀矿物的稀土元素组成，重点关注其在矿化阶段之间的分布和浓度差异。该方法有助于识别独特的稀土元素模式，暗示潜在的新铀矿物。相比之下，SIMS U-Pb 定年法用于确定铀矿物的年龄，改进了对常见铅数据的处理，并扩展了定年的适用性。虽然 LA–ICP–MS 提供了地球化学特征和矿物身份的见解，但 SIMS U-Pb 定年法则提供了精确的年龄确定，有助于理解矿化事件的时间。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the variation in REE distribution patterns among different uraniferous mineralization stages indicate about the geochemical processes involved in the formation of uranium deposits in South China?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同铀矿化阶段中稀土元素分布模式的变化可以表明华南铀矿床形成过程中涉及的地球化学过程是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The variation in REE distribution patterns among different uraniferous mineralization stages could suggest that different geochemical processes were involved in the formation of uranium deposits in South China. The similar distribution patterns of REEs across different mineralization stages, despite significant differences in content, might indicate that while similar sources or processes may have been involved, the conditions or the extent of the processes varied significantly. The presence of a Eu positive anomaly and differences with surrounding rock types and other uranium deposits suggest unique geochemical conditions or post-formational processes influencing the REE characteristics. Additionally, the identification of potentially new uranium minerals like Vorlanite suggests the presence of previously unrecognized geochemical processes or conditions during mineral formation.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 不同铀矿化阶段中REE分布模式的变化可能表明在中国南方铀矿床的形成过程中涉及了不同的地球化学过程。尽管不同矿化阶段的REE分布模式相似，但含量差异显著，这可能表明虽然可能涉及相似的来源或过程，但条件或过程的程度却有显著差异。Eu正异常的存在以及与周围岩石类型和其他铀矿床的差异，暗示了影响REE特征的独特地球化学条件或后形成过程。此外，潜在新铀矿物如Vorlanite的识别，表明在矿物形成过程中可能存在以前未被认识的地球化学过程或条件。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the variability in rare earth element (REE) distribution patterns in uranium minerals from different mineralization stages in the South China uranium deposits?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在南中国铀矿床中，不同矿化阶段的铀矿物中稀土元素（REE）分布模式的变异性受哪些因素影响？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The variability in REE distribution patterns in uranium minerals from different mineralization stages in the South China uranium deposits is influenced by the mineralization age and the type of uranium minerals present. For example, variations in elements like La, Eu, Dy, Yb, and Lu can differ by several orders of magnitude between stages. Additionally, the REE distribution patterns exhibit distinct differences compared to those in surrounding rocks such as Sondong granite and diabase, suggesting unique geochemical processes at play during formation. The presence of a potential new uranium mineral, high uranium calcium (Vorlanite), further supports these distinctions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 南中国铀矿床中不同矿化阶段铀矿物的稀土元素（REE）分布模式的变异性受到矿化年龄和铀矿物类型的影响。例如，La、Eu、Dy、Yb和Lu等元素在不同阶段之间的变化可以相差几个数量级。此外，REE分布模式与周围岩石如Sondong花岗岩和辉长岩相比，表现出明显的差异，表明在形成过程中存在独特的地球化学过程。潜在的新铀矿物高铀钙矿（Vorlanite）的存在进一步支持了这些区别。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to develop a systematic approach to date uranium mineralization events using various U-Pb dating techniques in geochemical studies of uranium deposits?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在铀矿床的地球化学研究中，采用各种U-Pb定年技术系统性地确定铀矿化事件的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Developing a systematic approach to date uranium mineralization events using various U-Pb dating techniques is important because it allows researchers to accurately determine the ages of uranium deposits. This can facilitate the understanding of the timing and processes of mineralization events, especially in complex geological settings like those in South China. By using different dating methods, researchers can cross-verify ages and improve the reliability of age determinations, which is crucial for reconstructing the geodynamic history and metallogenic evolution of a region. Such approaches also help in identifying the youngest uranium mineralization events and their association with geological activities like volcanic intrusions under specific tectonic settings.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 开发系统化的方法来利用各种U-Pb定年技术对铀矿化事件进行定年是重要的，因为这可以让研究人员准确确定铀矿床的年龄。这有助于理解矿化事件的时序和过程，特别是在像中国南方这样复杂的地质环境中。通过使用不同的定年方法，研究人员可以交叉验证年龄，提高年龄测定的可靠性，这对于重建一个地区的地质动力学历史和成矿演化至关重要。这种方法还帮助识别最新的铀矿化事件及其与特定构造背景下火山侵入等地质活动的关联。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental and procedural steps are involved in analyzing uranium mineral age using the SIMS U-Pb dating technique, and how do these steps ensure accuracy given the challenges of high common Pb content?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用SIMS U-Pb定年技术分析铀矿物年龄涉及哪些仪器和程序步骤，这些步骤如何在高普通铅含量的挑战下确保准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The analysis of uranium mineral age using the SIMS U-Pb dating technique involves optimizing the SIMS U-Pb dating process and improving high common Pb data processing methods. This ensures the accuracy of the dating by expanding its applicability, as demonstrated by obtaining consistent age results with the U-Th-Pb chemical age method in granite-hosted uranium minerals. Addressing high common Pb content challenges includes using specific calibration procedures and data correction techniques to minimize errors and achieve reliable age determinations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 使用SIMS U-Pb定年技术分析铀矿物年龄涉及优化SIMS U-Pb定年过程和改进高共生铅数据处理方法。这确保了定年的准确性，通过与花岗岩宿主铀矿物的U-Th-Pb化学年龄法获得一致的年龄结果，扩展了其适用性。解决高共生铅含量挑战包括使用特定的校准程序和数据修正技术，以最小化误差并实现可靠的年龄测定。
